introduction.body:
Filmpje waarin het verhaal wordt voorgelezen:

Link naar het verhaal zelf: http://www.d123.org/covington/kogean/documents/horton_hears_a_who.pdf

Introduction by teacher: background short story and Dr. Suess

prompt.body: What do you think will happen in this short story?
What happens in the very beginning where Horton hears the sound?

values.value: Horton hears a sound/ small noise, but sees nothing but a small speck of dust.

content.body: Horton hears a sound/ small noise, but sees nothing but a small speck of dust.

prompt.body: What do you think he means when he says "A person's a person, no matter how small" ?

values.value: It doesn´t matter how small a person is, it is still a person.

content.body: It doesn´t matter how small a person is, it is still a person.

prompt.body: Why do the animals in the jungle not believe Horton when he tells them about Who-ville?

values.value: Because they can´t see anything.The can´t see the ´whos´.

content.body: Because they can´t see anything.The can´t see the ´whos´.

prompt.body: What does Horton do to make them believe that there are small persons on that 'small speck of dust'?

values.value: He lets all the whos scream so that everyone can hear them.

content.body: He lets all the whos scream so that everyone can hear them.

values.value: The whos are saved by Horton. The other animals now believe him because they can hear the whos and they are going to protect them all together.

content.body: The whos are saved by Horton. The other animals now believe him because they can hear the whos and they are going to protect them all together.

prompt.body: Make a list of all the characters we have gotten to know in the story and write down three characteristics (karaktereigenschappen) for each character.

values.value: Horton, The Whos, Jo-Jo, The Wickersham brothers, the kangaroos

content.body: Horton, The Whos, Jo-Jo, The Wickersham brothers, the kangaroos

prompt.body: Choose your favourite character and make a drawing of what you think this character looks like.

introduction.body: Ga onderstaande alinea's van het verhaaltje over Snow White in de juiste volgorde zetten. Als je dit lukt kan je verder met de volgende opdracht A2 - Snow white (2). Laat het eindresultaat in een apart venster open staan zodat je het verhaal kan gebruiken in je volgende opdracht.

prompt.body: Put in the right order with the first sentence at the top.

content.body: A long time ago, a child was born to a queen and king and she was called Snow White. When the queen died, the king married again. This new queen was wicked and hated Snow white. The queen gave orders that Snow White was to be treated as a servant.
The Huntsman had a kind heart and couldn't do the deed so told her to run away. She fled into the woods where Seven little dwarfs lived. Their house was small and strange.
But one day the mirror answered Snow White was the fairest in the land, and in a rage the queen gave orders to one of her Huntsmen to take Snow White into the woods and kill her.
Snow White entered the little house and finding it very untidy, started to clean up. Upstairs she found seven little beds. She was very tired and stretching out on one of the beds, was soon asleep.
The queen was beautiful too, and every day she asked her Magic Mirror, "Who is the fairest in the land?" and the mirror always answered, "You are the fairest one of all".

The Queen discovered where Snow White was living and disguising herself as a witch, took a poisoned apple and set out for the Dwarfs cottage. She gave Snow White the poisoned apple to eat and as soon as she bit the apple, she sank into unconsciousness.
When the Dwarfs came home they were surprised to find Snow White and after some argument, decided to let her stay. She promised to cook and look after them.

Thinking she was dead, the Dwarfs built a glass coffin and put her in it. For days she lay in the forest in her glass coffin. One day, the Prince was riding through the forest looking for Snow White and found her. He leaned over and kissed her. She opened her eyes and sat up with a smile. Everyone was happy. The Prince took Snow White to his palace where they were married and lived happily ever after.
Snow White grew very beautiful and one day a Prince riding by, saw her at work and fell in love with her.

Geef per zin aan of deze True or False is.

1. The new queen is Snow White's mother. True False
2. Snow White and the prince met each other at work. True False
3. The mirror thinks Snow White is the fairest in the land. True False
4. The huntsman wants to kill Snow White in the woods. True False
5. When Snow White entered the house the dwarfs weren't there. True False
6. The dwarfs were happy to see Snow White. True False
7. The queen pretends to be a witch. True False
8. Snow White falls asleep after eating an apple. True False
9. The prince was taking a walk in the forest when he found Snow White. True False
10. The prince and Snow White married in a palace. True False

prompt.body: Now rewrite the ending of the story. So imagine the story stopped with "she sank into unconsciousness…". Write one paragraph of about 80-100 words that will end the fairy tale about Snow White.

introduction.body:

Complete the sentences. Choose from have got/ have/ some/ any.

questions.label: Choose the position where the adverb of frequency needs to be.

introduction.body: For each of the gaps choose the option which is best. See the gap options at the end of the text.

content.body: Tracy is girl, 15 years old, who two brothers and two sisters. Today she to Amsterdam train to buy some new clothes for spring. She any idea of what exactly she but she is sure that clothes she will buy to be great.

She , however, not only going to buy for herself, she will also buy her siblings a present. She much money to spend on them, but she does have . Tracy is convinced that she will buy them, no matter how small or cheap, wonderful.

Right now she to a shop she has been to before. It must be that new shop her friend Amy about. Tracy at the display the window. The red trousers the back of display look terrible but those next to them, the blue ones, are ok. She to buy them.

Now she is walking into a gift shop where she to buy a gift for her brothers. She yet what she will get for but it will not be those horrible Minions who are staring at her from the shelves at the back of the shop.

… Suddenly she jumps and… she wakes up in her own bed. "Oh", she , "how strange. I don't usually remember my dreams. What a weird dream this one was."

introduction.body: Fill in the missing words in the texts below. In each gap you will need to fill in either the present continuous or the present simple of the verb listed to make the sentence complete (and logical).

content.body:
Hey there Max, what you ? (do)
I (make) my homework, I want to have it finished before this tv-show comes on.
Why did you start this late? I always (do) my homework right after school.
Well, on Wednesdays I first (have) football training at 15:00, so I
(not have) any time to (do) it earlier.
Ok then, mom and I (go) shopping, so I´ll see you later.
Alright, (bring) some candy for me, please! Bye.

Hi Dana, you (have) a minute?
Hold on, I (try) to finish this paper… Done! What´s up?

you (like) Italian food? I (know) a really great restaurant.
My mom always (cook) dinner which (be) usually simple British food, so I´m not that familiar with Italian food actually.
Then this (be) the perfect time to try, let´s go!
